name: Humansis
description: Humansis is a humanitarian delivery platform that provides a more open, secure, functional and easy to use method of aid delivery, promoting transparency, and reducing opportunities for fraud and data theft.

SDGs.evidenceText: Developed by the the humanitarian community for the humanitarian community, Humansis harnesses the latest in web based technology, so that your organisation can assist people, quickly and efficiently. The first and only open source humanitarian aid platform.
